name: NSOutlineViewDataSource
desc: A set of methods that an outline view calls to retrieve data and information about it from the data source delegate, and—optionally—to update data values.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, acceptDrop: NSDraggingInfo, item: Any?, childIndex: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a drop operation was successful.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, child: Int, ofItem: Any?) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the child item at the specified index of a given item.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, draggingSession: NSDraggingSession, endedAt: NSPoint, operation: NSDragOperation)
items.desc: Implement this method to know when the given dragging session has ended.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, draggingSession: NSDraggingSession, willBeginAt: NSPoint, forItems: [Any])
items.desc: Implement this method know when the given dragging session is about to begin and potentially modify the dragging session.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, isItemExpandable: Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the a given item is expandable.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, itemForPersistentObject: Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Invoked by outlineView to return the item for the archived object.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, numberOfChildrenOfItem: Any?) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of child items encompassed by a given item.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, objectValueFor: NSTableColumn?, byItem: Any?) -> Any?
items.desc: Invoked by outlineView to return the data object associated with the specified item.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, pasteboardWriterForItem: Any) -> NSPasteboardWriting?
items.desc: Implement this method to enable the table to be an NSDraggingSource that supports dragging multiple items.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, persistentObjectForItem: Any?) -> Any?
items.desc: Invoked by outlineView to return an archived object for item.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, setObjectValue: Any?, for: NSTableColumn?, byItem: Any?)
items.desc: Set the data object for a given item in a given column.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, sortDescriptorsDidChange: [NSSortDescriptor])
items.desc: Invoked by an outline view to notify the data source that the descriptors changed and the data may need to be resorted.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, updateDraggingItemsForDrag: NSDraggingInfo)
items.desc: Implement this method to enable the table to update dragging items as they are dragged over the view.

items.name: func outlineView(NSOutlineView, validateDrop: NSDraggingInfo, proposedItem: Any?, proposedChildIndex: Int) -> NSDragOperation
items.desc: Used by an outline view to determine a valid drop target.
